properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Ft; Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 2 at 3:52AM MST until February 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow
accumulations of 8 to 14 inches over the San Juan Range, and 4
to 10 inches for the La Garita Range, Mosquito and Sawatch
Mountains. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...The western Mosquito Range, East Lake County and the
Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet, La Garita
Mountains and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet.

* WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over Wolf
Creek and Monarch Passes due to snow packed, icy roads. Areas
of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The
cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite
on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
